home.title: Hi, I'm Michael
home.tagline: I develop clean and user friendly websites, solve client problems and create awesome designs.
home.about: My overall goal is to help my clients reach theirs. While working in the agency world I have created responsive and user-friendly websites, dynamic and intuitive mobile applications and worked with multiple libraries and frameworks. Have a problem that needs to be solved?

services.description: I create responsive, clean and user-friendly sites. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, SASS, Javascipt, and React.
I like to keep things clean and simple. Intuitive for the user and easy on the eyes.
I never want to limit myself to a medium. I like to explore and be creative.

portfolio.title: B-Side Games
portfolio.description: This is that place where a description belongs!

testimonials.author: Geneva Johns-Kloor
testimonials.testimonialPOne: "Michael really came through for Women Helping Women Fund when we needed a developer for our Wix site. We had spoken to six other vendors (some even certified as Wix friendly) and he was the only one willing to take on our project without changing the scope.
testimonials.testimonialPTwo: It was important to us that we use the code provided by our database provider for the forms on our site. Other vendors would only take on the project if we would settle for a workaround solution, but Michael made it happen. He was able to get the forms up and running while also making them look visually appealing. He listened to our needs and produced great results despite the weird quirks we found with the Wix platform.
testimonials.testimonialPThree: He also helped us to optimize our site and fix some other pieces that were giving our staff some trouble. He was very responsive and a great communicator through the whole process. He went above and beyond on our project."
